title: BRIEF-TE Connectivity Announces Q2 Earnings Per Share $1.39 From Continuing Operations
text:
April 25 (Reuters) - TE Connectivity Ltd:
* TE CONNECTIVITY ANNOUNCES RESULTS FOR SECOND QUARTER OF FISCAL YEAR 2018
* Q2 SALES $3.7 BILLION VERSUS I/B/E/S VIEW $3.61 BILLION * Q2 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $1.36 — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* SEES Q3 2018 ADJUSTED EARNINGS PER SHARE $1.35 TO $1.37 * SEES FY 2018 EARNINGS PER SHARE $3.70 TO $3.76 FROM CONTINUING OPERATIONS
* SEES Q3 2018 EARNINGS PER SHARE $1.13 TO $1.15 FROM CONTINUING OPERATIONS
* SEES Q3 2018 SALES $3.65 BILLION TO $3.7 BILLION * FY DILUTED EPS FROM CONTINUING OPERATIONS ARE EXPECTED TO BE $3.70 TO $3.76
* COMPANY EXPECTS FY ADJUSTED EPS OF $5.52 TO $5.58 * Q3 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $1.37 — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* ORDERS, EXCLUDING COMPANY’S SUBCOM BUSINESS, WERE $3.7 BILLION IN QUARTER, UP 6 PERCENT ORGANICALLY FROM Q2 OF 2017
* FY2018 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $5.51 — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
